titles.title: The Spirit Of The Lord Is Moving In This Place

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
Now the lame are a-walkin' and the dump are a-talkin'
Of God's love that flows so free.
And the hills are a-ringin', and the stones are a-singin',
All creation praises The.
Hear the angels shout, Glory! as they tell the wondrous story,
How He gave His life for me.
Now there's no sin a-hidin', 'cause I'm in the vine abidin'.
Jesus gives the victory.
